caption.p: Monthly average influenza virus activity and climatic parameters in Panzhihua during 2006â€“2015. (a) The monthly average positive rates (square-root transformed) of influenza A subtypes. Error bars show standard errors based on variation between years. (b) The same as A, but for influenza B lineages. (c) Temperature, vapour pressure, and relative humidity. (d) Precipitation and sunshine hours.
